page.title: 14Trials Riding by Kevin
page.content: I go Motorbike riding because I enjoy it.It takes skill and stamina to ride a trials motorbike.I go to Bagmoor quarry but there are lots of other places where you can scramble.My bike is a Yamaha TY80.Lots of boys have bikes like me.Usually these bikes have an engine size between 80cc and 125cc.The clothing that people wear is leather suits with padding on the knees,elbows and a crash helmet.This special clothing is necessary because accidents do happen and if you are involved your normal clothing would be damaged and you yourself might be cut or grazed.Competition and events are arranged to see who can go round a particular course in the shortest time .If you miss an obstacle or put your feet down you get time faults.
